programme.title: Revival
programme.desc: As the dead return to life in a small town, Officer Dana Cypress unearths a new deadly mystery.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry must escape an outer space prison to stop a dangerous threat in town.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a student disappears during a school trip to New York, the cops race to find a mysterious masked man; Fin and Stone both get visits from family.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU must break through military red tape when a soldier is suspected of sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An old kidnapping case is reopened when a young woman is found wandering in Central Park; Carisi's conversation with a reporter puts him in hot water.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is found dead, Rollins goes under cover at a high-end rehab center where the victim was last seen; Benson tries to overcome her doubts about Sheila.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson must disclose the secrets of her past to help a rape victim recall the details of one terrible, traumatic night.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins races to rescue a girl being held captive by her father.

A skating mishap at an ice show; an accident involving a self-driving car; a fulfillment warehouse robot goes rogue; Eddie's after-hours fight club gets out of control; Hen struggles in her relationship with Karen.

The 118 responds to debris from a meteor shower crashing into an apartment building and a deadly fire caused by a hazardous waste truck crash; Hen struggles with guilt over her ambulance accident; Bobby introduces Eddie to an old friend.

The 118 races to rescue a little girl in a runaway hot air balloon and help with a city power outage caused by a hijacked tree-trimmer truck; Athena's investigation into the serial rapist case puts her life in jeopardy.
The 118 rush to save lives in the aftermath of a massive train derailment.

When the Hollywood Reservoir dam breaks, Bobby and the 118 race into action to save passengers on a city bus that has crashed into a building several stories in the air; the team adjusts to life as first responders during the pandemic.

In the aftermath of the dam break, massive mudslides wreak havoc throughout Los Angeles; Athena fights to save herself and an agoraphobic woman after her house collapses; a group of pregnant women trapped in a submerged house.

The team races to save a man under siege by his high-tech smart home; a yoga teacher loses her vision; Athena hunts down a bank robber disguised by COVID-19 protocols; members of the 118's crew prepare for an out-of-state mission.

A man gets pinned under a Humvee; a garage band rocks out too hard; Michael notices strange behavior at a nearby apartment; Hen's mother unexpectedly arrives and announces she is moving to Los Angeles.

Athena and the 118 race to save lives after a drunken driver causes a deadly pileup on the freeway; Maddie goes into labor; Hen and Karen are devastated as they prepare their foster daughter to be reunited with her birth mother.

The 118 responds to calls dealing with parents and their children, including a disastrous birthday party thrown by a mommy blogger; Athena and Michael talk to May about her past suicide attempt; Chimney and Maddie adjust to life with their newborn.

A social media influencer has an accident in a sauna; an emergency at a reality show wedding; a tragedy when a mother and her daughter go hiking; Maddie worries she has missed too many firsts with Jee-Yun.

The 118 races to the rescue when the call center goes up in flames; Bobby risks his life to save a trapped May and Claudette; Buck and Eddie must help an injured electrician; Chimney and his brother team up as firefighters for the first time.

After a mysterious death, Hen and Chimney put their lives in danger when they suspect that someone is playing God to make themselves look like a hero; Eddie visits Texas, where he attempts to reconcile with his father.

Members of the 118 attempt to rescue a wellness retreat guru after his followers turn on him; an emergency call at an upscale hair salon; Maddie contemplates returning to work, Eddie and May make decisions about their future.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Juventus meet Stuttgart at Allianz Stadium. This is the first ever meeting between these two sides in any competition.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Unai Emery's Aston Villa host Bologna at Villa Park. Bologna are winless in their last four games in major European competition.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Real Madrid meet Borussia Dortmund at Santiago Bernabeu. This is the first time these two sides have met since last season's final.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Barcelona take on Bayern Munich at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys. Barca have lost their last six matches against Bayern, conceding 22 goals.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: UEFA Champions League action as Atletico Madrid and Lille face-off at Civitas Metropolitano. Diego Simeone's side have won each of their last six on home soil in this competition.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Action from the UEFA Champions League as Celtic face Marco Rose's RB Leipzig at Celtic Park. Leipzig have lost all three of their matches in the Champions League this season.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
